hero.title: Well Located Independent Houses for Rent in Sector 23 Gurugram
description: Sector 23 Gurugram is a well-established residential locality known for its excellent connectivity, calm surroundings, and proximity to major commercial areas. Tenants looking for a house for rent in Sector 23 Gurugram prefer this area because it is close to Palam Vihar, Udyog Vihar, and IGI Airport, making daily commuting convenient. The sector has wide internal roads, parks, schools, hospitals, and local markets, ensuring a comfortable and practical lifestyle for families and working professionals.

Independent houses in Sector 23 offer spacious layouts, privacy, and a peaceful living environment compared to high-density apartment complexes. The locality is ideal for long-term rentals due to its stable infrastructure and established residential community. Choosing a house for rent in Sector 23 Gurugram means enjoying a balanced lifestyle with easy access to workplaces, daily essentials, and strong road connectivity within Gurugram and Gurgaon.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Houses for Rent in Sector 23 Gurugram
faqSection.description: Common tenant questions related to house for rent in Sector 23 Gurugram.

faqs.question: Is Sector 23 Gurugram a good area to rent a house?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 23 is a well-established residential area with good connectivity and a peaceful environment.

faqs.question: What types of houses are available for rent in Sector 23?
faqs.answer: Independent houses ranging from 4 Marla to 14 Marla are available for different budgets and family sizes.

faqs.question: Is Sector 23 suitable for family living?
faqs.answer: Yes, the sector has schools, parks, hospitals, and markets nearby, making it ideal for families.

faqs.question: Are furnished houses available for rent in Sector 23?
faqs.answer: Yes, furnished and semi-furnished houses are available depending on the property and landlord.

faqs.question: What is the average rent in Sector 23 Gurugram?
faqs.answer: Rental values depend on plot size, furnishings, and location, offering both mid-range and premium options.

faqs.question: How is connectivity from Sector 23?
faqs.answer: Sector 23 offers easy access to Palam Vihar, Udyog Vihar, NH-48, and IGI Airport.

faqs.question: Are bachelors allowed to rent houses in Sector 23?
faqs.answer: Some landlords allow bachelors, while others prefer families, depending on owner preferences.

faqs.question: Is Sector 23 safe for tenants?
faqs.answer: Yes, it is considered a safe and well-populated residential locality.

faqs.question: Why should I choose Deal Acres for renting a house?
faqs.answer: Deal Acres provides verified listings, transparent details, and expert local rental support.
